group_1.textRight: There you are.
You stood me up.

group_1.textLeft: You didn't tell me you were bringing someone.

group_1.textRight: So you were there, after all.
That girl was Nagisa Momoe. She's a candidate@to become a new Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: You make contracts with girls that young,@too?

group_1.textRight: Yes, she is young.
That's why I was hoping you could help@guide her once she makes a contract.
As a fellow Magical Girl, you'd be a better@teacher than me.

group_1.textLeft: Are you serious?
A child that young, becoming a Magical Girl?!
She'll die right away!

group_1.textRight: You don't know that for sure. We have had@young Magical Girls before.
Besides, I'm recruiting her because you@aren't fulfilling your duties.
You're even ignoring the Witches in your own@territory.
So, I need to find someone to cover for you,@as quickly as possible.

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's not... I took on more shifts at@work this month.
I have a regular life too, you know!

group_1.textRight: I'm not picking on you. I give warnings to@others, too.
But you're definitely the reason I'm in a rush@to recruit Nagisa Momoe.
That fact is undisputed.
You're neglecting your duties as a Magical@Girl.
You also need to be careful not to run out of@Grief Seeds.
You need to hunt more Witches.

group_1.textLeft: That's enough!
More importantly, have you looked into who@the ghost is targeting?
Do you know who they are?

group_1.textRight: This again...
I didn't just look into it, I asked her@myself.
Does it even matter if that man you're@worried about is on that list or not?
I don't think you should be risking your@safety for him, in any case.
He doesn't seem to be worth all that.

group_1.textLeft: There's no way Sho did anything wrong!
Everyone's just spreading rumors about him!
He's kind, and cool, and adored by the people@around him...
If anything happened to Sho, I don't know@what I'd do...
Kyubey...
Tell me if he's being targeted or not.
Why won't you tell me?

group_1.textRight: You could be helping so many more people@as a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Never mind, I'll go talk to the ghost myself.
Also, I'm completely against that girl making@a contract with you, got it?!
I'm not looking after her, even if she does@make a contract!

group_1.textRight: Good grief... I just don't understand.
